channel.title: apprentice on Sivert Does Stuff Online!
channel.description: Recent content in apprentice on Sivert Does Stuff Online!

item.title: SkyLabs
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: SkyLabs has surprisingly good stability compared to expectations based on the codebase. I’m guessing it’s a byproduct of Python that let’s us fail pretty safely on almost all endpoints. The in-house development is mainly four services, two JS frontends and two Python Flask backends, all web. These services are a captive portal, it’s API and an admin interface web app and it’s API. We support lots of interesting authentication methods!~

item.title: Sircon
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: These guys have a few beefy ass physical servers in their own rack in a supposedly EMP and fire safe room in the basement of their offices. Those physical machines run virtual machines that run WHM/cPanel and whatever PHP app the customer would like. But >90% of their customers are non-technical and just only interact with the default WordPress setup and maybe the e-mail service that comes with their cPanel. Most of the people calling in to their support line has problems using their e-mail, and it’s usually the end user who fucked up.

item.title: Security issues
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: Here is a collection of security issues I found, disclosed and got fixed as an apprentice! This one is divided into two main parts corresponding to the company I worked with when finding the issues. First one is Sircon and second SkyLabs. I have a pretty extensive Non Disclosure Agreement with SkyLabs. So anything I publish to the internet around them needs to be approved or clearly not covered by the NDA.

item.title: IT Apprentice
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: This section of my blog serves as an index of technologies I’ve learned or became better at as an apprentice working in IT. 😀 It also serves the purpose of the required documentation apprentices in Norway are supposed to do. 😳 Here are lists of stuff I’ll be writing about here; ❌ not started 🚧 marks work in progress ✅ marks complete! Programming Python ❌ Flask 🍼 ❌ SQLAlchemy 🍶 🚧 MSAL (Microsoft Authentication Library) 🪕 Browser JavaScript ❌ jQuery 📲 🚧 Handlebars.
